author: Stu Woo
title: Is Broadcom’s $117 Billion Pursuit of Qualcomm a National Security Threat?
text:
On the surface, the U.S. government is intervening in Broadcom Ltd.’s bid for Qualcomm Inc. because a Singapore-based company is trying to buy a San Diego-based one that does sensitive business with the American government.
However, at its core, U.S. worries about the deal could center more on the arms race playing out with China over future wireless technology.
Global...
